title: AI Workflow Architect (n8n + OpenAI + APIs)
job_overview:
We’re hiring a technical builder to create n8n workflows that fully automate content writing using AI and supporting tools.

???? Must-Have Skills
1+ year hands-on with n8n (not just basic flows, real modular builds)

Proven experience building multi-step LLM prompt chains via OpenAI API

Strong understanding of how to build and manage long-form output 

Comfort working in Node.js or Python for scripting custom functions, fetches, formatting

Fluent in API integrations (e.g. Airtable, Notion, YouTube, RSS, Google Docs)

???? Example Deliverables
Blog article writer from 3 input keywords + tone/style selector

Research-based script generator: pulls top Reddit threads, quotes, and facts on a given theme

Airtable-integrated content planner with auto-writing pipeline

???? TO APPLY — Answer These in Your Cover Letter:
1. What’s the most advanced n8n + AI workflow you’ve built (brief summary)?

2. How would you build a longform script-writing workflow that starts with a video title and ends with a 5,000+ word script? List the tools, structure, and prompts you'd use.

3. Share any screenshots or links showing your automation builds (especially writing-related).

4. Rate your skill level with Python or Node.js for n8n functions.

We’re building systems that can write better, faster, and smarter. If you’ve already built something like this—or you’re dying to—apply now.

Subject line must be: POTATO MILKSHAKE
Let’s build the writing machines of the future.

DO NOT USE AI IN YOUR APPLICATION. We dont mind mistakes, just make sure to add your experience or samples of screenshots to your application, other wise we won't look at it.
